attributes.action: Regulate Agricultural/Tractors using the highway at peak traffic times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tractors are using roads round the country between peak travelling periods and causing hold ups/ congestion and this leads to road rage and frustrated drives on our roads.

I would like to see these vehicles prohibited from using our roads between the hours of 7.30am to 9.30am and from 4.30 to 6.30pm.  

Tractor/Agricultural drivers are supposed to pull over when there is a tail back of traffic - this is not taking place.
